verses.verse: <S%H8085>Listen<s%> to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> O <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has a <S%H7379>case<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H571>faithfulness<s%> or <S%H2617>kindness<s%> Or <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourns,<s%> And <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who <S%H3427>lives<s%> in it <S%H535>languishes<s%> Along with the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky;<s%> And <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H1709>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H622>disappear.<s%>

<S%H389>Yet<s%> let <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7378>find<s%> <S%H7378>fault,<s%> and let <S%H408>none<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H3198>offer<s%> <S%H3198>reproof;<s%> For your <S%H5971>people<s%> are like those who <S%H7378>contend<s%> with the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

So you will <S%H3782>stumble<s%> by <S%H3117>day,<s%> And the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H3782>stumble<s%> with you by <S%H3915>night;<s%> And I will <S%H1820>destroy<s%> your <S%H517>mother.<s%>

My <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H1820>destroyed<s%> for <S%H369>lack<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> you have <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> I also will <S%H3988>reject<s%> you from being My <S%H3547>priest.<s%> Since you have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of your <S%H430>God,<s%> I <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H7911>forget<s%> your <S%H1121>children.<s%>
The more they <S%H7231>multiplied,<s%> the <S%H3651>more<s%> they <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against Me; I will <S%H4171>change<s%> their <S%H9202>glory<s%> into <S%H7036>shame.<s%>
They <S%H398>feed<s%> on the <S%H9128>sin<s%> of My <S%H5971>people,<s%> And <S%H5375>direct<s%> their <S%H5315>desire<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
And it will be, like <S%H5971>people,<s%> like <S%H3548>priest;<s%> So I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> them for their <S%H1870>ways,<s%> And <S%H7725>repay<s%> them for their <S%H4611>deeds.<s%>

And they will <S%H398>eat,<s%> but not <S%H7646>have<s%> <S%H7646>enough;<s%> They will <S%H2181>play<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> but not <S%H6555>increase,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> they have <S%H5800>stopped<s%> <S%H8104>giving<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7592>consult<s%> their <S%H6086>wooden<s%> idol, and their [diviner's] <S%H4731>wand<s%> <S%H5046>informs<s%> them; For a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2183>harlotry<s%> has <S%H8582>led<s%> [them] <S%H8582>astray,<s%> And they have <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> [departing] from their <S%H430>God.<s%>

They <S%H2076>offer<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> on the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> And <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> on the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> <S%H8478>Under<s%> <S%H437>oak,<s%> <S%H3839>poplar,<s%> and <S%H424>terebinth,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> their <S%H6738>shade<s%> is <S%H2896>pleasant.<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H2181>play<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> And your <S%H3618>brides<s%> <S%H5003>commit<s%> <S%H5003>adultery.<s%>

I will not <S%H6485>punish<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H2181>play<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> Or your <S%H3618>brides<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H5003>commit<s%> <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> For [the men] <S%H1992>themselves<s%> <S%H6504>go<s%> <S%H6504>apart<s%> with <S%H2181>harlots<s%> And <S%H2076>offer<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> with <S%H6945>temple<s%> <S%H6945>prostitutes;<s%> So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H995>understanding<s%> are <S%H3832>ruined.<s%>

<S%H518>Though<s%> you, <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2181>play<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> Do not let <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H816>become<s%> <S%H816>guilty;<s%> Also do not <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> Or <S%H5927>go<s%> up to Beth-aven, And <S%H7650>take<s%> the <S%H7650>oath:<s%> "As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives!<s%>"

<S%H3588>Since<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> Like a <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> <S%H6499>heifer,<s%> Can the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7462>pasture<s%> them Like a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> in a <S%H4800>large<s%> <S%H4800>field<s%>?
The <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H9503>wraps<s%> them in its <S%H3671>wings,<s%> And they will be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of their <S%H2077>sacrifices.<s%>
